doc:
Shirley Eaton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shirley_Eaton 0 Shirley Eaton (born 12 January 1937) is an English actress, model and author. She was a sex symbol in the 1950s and 1960s, often dubbed the cockney Blonde bombshell for her London accent, blonde hair and sex appeal. Eaton appeared regularly in British films throughout the 1950s and 1960s, and achieved notability for her performance as Bond Girl Jill Masterson in the 1964 James Bond film Goldfinger. Eaton also had notable roles in the early Carry On films. Preferring to devote herself to bringing up a family, Eaton retired from acting in 1969. Eaton also had notable_roles in the_early_Carry On films . Preferring_to_devote herself to bringing up a_family , Eaton retired from acting in 1969 .
